metadata.name: Louisiana

reference.reference: Walton, W.D., D.D. Evans, K.B. McGrattan, H.R. Baum, W.H. Twilley, D.Madrzykowski, A.D. Putorti, R.G. Rehm, H. Koseki, and E.J. Tennyson, "In Situ Burning of Oil Spills: Mesoscale Experiments and Analysis", Proceedings of the 16th Arctic and Marine Oil Spill Program Technical Seminar, Environment Canada, Ottawa, Ontario, pp. 679-734, 1993

metadata.comments: This oil was used in the 1992 mesoscale in situ burning experiments carried out on Little Sand Island offshore of Mobile, Alabama, USA. The oil originated from wells in the Louisiana area and was obtained from an oil storage facility in Louisiana.

status: E030: Oils must have an API
W100: Not GNOME compatible: Cannot initialize a Density object with no data
